extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Get that super deal feeling every time you shop online with instant discounts on all your favourites.
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

action_popup.subtitle.message: You're about to be one of the savviest shoppers on the planet with all the coupons coming your way.

action_popup.back_to_publisher.description: Back button text with publisher name placeholder

aa_start_popup.title.description: Main heading for auto-apply start popup

aa_start_popup.primary_button.description: Primary button text for auto-apply popup

aa_start_popup.secondary_button.description: Secondary button text for auto-apply popup

aa_progress.stop_with_savings.description: Stop button text when savings found

aa_progress.stop_no_savings.description: Stop button text when no savings found

aa_progress.savings_message_1.message: You have saved $1 so far! You're flying, keep on going

aa_progress.savings_message_2.message: Crushing it! You've saved $1 so far – but we're not done yet!

aa_progress.savings_message_3.message: Nice! You've saved $1 so far – still trying to find you the best.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_1.message: Your savvy shopping skills are about to pay off BIG TIME.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_2.message: You're ahead of the pack – more deals are coming your way!

aa_progress.no_savings_message_3.message: Hang tight, saver! The best deals are just about to land.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_4.message: Great things take time and are worth the wait.

aa_progress.no_savings_message_5.message: What a savings pro! Keep your pockets full as we find even better for less.

aa_finish.supporting_text.message: No extra steps needed — We applied the best available code at checkout.
aa_finish.supporting_text.description: Final message indicating a code was applied with no user action needed

aa_finish.already_best_price.message: You already have the best price!
aa_finish.already_best_price.description: Message shown when no better discount is found

aa_error.generic_error.message: Sorry, we got a bit stuck...
aa_error.generic_error.description: Generic error message shown when auto-apply encounters a problem

aa_error.checkout_button.description: Button text to proceed to checkout after error

aa_stop_confirmation.success_message.description: Success message showing current savings and partner name

aa_stop_confirmation.success_supporting_.message: 👀 We can keep searching for more savings if you would like!
aa_stop_confirmation.success_supporting_.description: Message shown when one coupon is applied, but more are being tested

aa_stop_confirmation.keep_searching.description: Button text to continue searching for better deals

aa_stop_confirmation.secondary_button.description: Button text to stop and keep current savings

coupons_popup.copied_message.description: Success message when coupon is copied

copied_popup.success_message.description: Message shown when code is copied to clipboard

fab.default_message.description: Default message shown in FAB when no specific message is provided

fab.preparing_coupons.description: Message shown when auto-apply is initializing coupons

fab.searching_coupons.description: Message shown when system is searching for available coupons

fab.code_copied.description: Message shown after a coupon code is successfully copied

fab.coupons_found.description: Message shown when one or more coupons have been found; $1 will be replaced with the actual number

fab.we_spotted_a_better_deal.message: 👀 We spotted a better deal, at $1
fab.we_spotted_a_better_deal.description: Message shown when a better price is found; %s is replaced with the merchant name

fab.auto_apply_message1.message: Hey 👋 want us to run through all the coupons we’ve got for this store?
fab.auto_apply_message1.description: Message shown when prompting the user to apply all coupons for a store (variant 1)

fab.auto_apply_message2.message: Could be a deal hiding in here 👀 Want us to test them all for you?
fab.auto_apply_message2.description: Message shown to suggest hidden deals may exist (variant 2)

fab.auto_apply_message3.message: Found a few codes — we’ll test them all to find the best one 💸
fab.auto_apply_message3.description: Message shown when multiple codes are found and will be tested (variant 3)

fab.auto_apply_message4.message: Let’s give these coupons a spin — maybe we get lucky 🤞
fab.auto_apply_message4.description: Message shown when encouraging user to try coupons (variant 4)

fab.auto_apply_message5.message: We’ve got the codes. You’ve got the cart. Let’s see if they match.
fab.auto_apply_message5.description: Message shown when inviting user to test codes with their cart (variant 5)

fab.auto_apply_message6.message: Multiple codes found. Want us to test and apply the best one?
fab.auto_apply_message6.description: Message shown when multiple codes are available (variant 6)

fab.auto_apply_message7.message: You’re almost done. Want to scan for available discounts?
fab.auto_apply_message7.description: Message shown near checkout to suggest scanning for discounts (variant 7)

fab.auto_apply_message8.message: We’ll auto-test codes for you — quick and seamless.
fab.auto_apply_message8.description: Message shown to highlight auto-testing of coupons (variant 8)

fab.auto_apply_message9.message: Let us apply the best offer available in one click.

fab.auto_apply_message10.message: One click. All codes tested. Potential savings applied.
fab.auto_apply_message10.description: Message summarizing the value of one-click coupon testing (variant 10)

coupons.empty_title.message: No coupons for this store right now
coupons.empty_title.description: Title shown when there are no coupons available for the current store

coupons.empty_supporting_text.message: We’ll keep looking — savings could drop anytime.
coupons.empty_supporting_text.description: Supporting text shown when no coupons are currently available

coupons.try_all.description: CTA encouraging the user to test all available coupon codes

best_price.tab_name.description: Label for the Best Price tab

best_price.empty_title.description: Title shown when there are no alternative prices to compare

best_price.empty_supporting_text.message: When we find this product at other stores, you’ll see price differences here
best_price.empty_supporting_text.description: Supporting text shown when no price comparisons are available

best_price.lowest_price.description: Label for the best available price

best_price.go_to_site.description: CTA button label to redirect user to another site offering the product

best_price.current_site.description: Label indicating the user is viewing the current retailer's offer

best_price.add_extra_savings.description: CTA label encouraging the user to apply additional savings or coupons

alternate.empty_title.message: This is where you’ll see similar items — when we find them.
alternate.empty_title.description: Title shown when there are no alternative products yet

alternate.empty_supporting_text.message: We’ll surface other options with related styles, brands, or price points
alternate.empty_supporting_text.description: Supporting text shown for alternative products section when no results are available

alternate.title.description: Title for the section showing similar or related products

alternate.supporting_text.description: Supporting text encouraging users to explore alternatives for style or price benefits

alternate.unlock_savings.description: CTA encouraging the user to engage with alternative savings options
